function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low scores in technical domains","Impact":"Suboptimal building performance and energy efficiency","Mitigation":"Implement technical improvements and energy-efficient measures","Technologies":"Smart windows, locally generated electricity, storage units, EV charging infrastructure","People":"Building owners, occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of locally generated electricity and storage units","Impact":"Suboptimal energy efficiency and reliance on grid electricity","Mitigation":"Invest in renewable energy generation and storage solutions","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy storage units","People":"Building owners, energy managers","Owner":"Building owners, energy management professionals"},{"Description":"Low score in dynamic envelope for Case C","Impact":"Reduced thermal comfort and potential for energy loss","Mitigation":"Implement dynamic envelope improvements and smart control systems","Technologies":"Smart windows, sensors for open/closed detection","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"}]}
